blocks.data:
Gets all order taxes using `order_id`.
Each tax applied to an order. This information can be useful for reporting purposes.
Pass in the query parameter `?details=true` to return extra details about order taxes.
`order_product_id` and `line_item_type` are also returned.

All values are read-only.

### OAuth Scopes
|  **UI Name** | **Permission** | **Parameter** |
| --- | --- | --- |
|  Orders | modify | `store_v2_orders` |
|  Orders | read-only | `store_v2_orders_read_only` |

### Headers

|Header|Parameter|Description|
|-|-|-|
|`X-Auth-Token`|`access_token `|Obtained by creating an API account or installing an app in a BigCommerce control panel.|

### Example

```http
GET /stores/{$$.env.store_hash}/v3/catalog/summary
host: api.bigcommerce.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-Auth-Token: {access_token}
```

* For more information on Authenticating BigCommerce APIs, see: [Authentication](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-docs/getting-started/authentication).
* **Name**: X-Auth-Token
* **Location**: header

page.description: The page to return in the response.

details.description: To return detailed tax information, pass in the details query.

id.description: The unique numeric identifier of the taxes object.

order_id.description: The unique numeric identifier of the order to which the tax was applied. NOTE: Not included if the store was using the automatic tax feature.

order_address_id.description: The unique numeric identifier of the order address object associated with the order. NOTE: Not included if the store was using the automatic tax feature.

tax_rate_id.description: The unique numeric identifier of the tax rate.

tax_class_id.description: The unique numeric identifier of the tax class object. NOTE: Will be 0 if automatic tax was enabled, or if the default tax class was used.

name.description: The name of the tax class object.

class.description: The name of the type of tax that was applied. NOTE: will be 'Automatic Tax' if automatic tax was enabled.

rate.description: The tax rate.  The priority order in which the tax is applied (Float, Float-As-String, Integer)

priority.description: The order in which the tax is applied

priority_amount.description: The amount of tax calculated on the order.   (Float, Float-As-String, Integer)

order_product_id.description: If the `line_item_type` is `item` or `handling` then this field will be the order product id. Otherwise the field will return as null.
